Issue.creator: ymlbright
Issue.summary: Useless error log when server tls handshake failed
Issue.description: ERRO 5fc88 TLS handshake failed with error EOF \{"server": "PeerServer", "remote address": "*"} 2019-06-24 17:13:15.627 UTC core.comm ServerHandshake -> ERRO 5fc89 TLS handshake failed with error tls: first record does not look like a TLS handshake \{"server": "PeerServer", "remote address": "*"} >
